name: Outdoor Gallery Series Presents: Black and White Bodies Dance, Dance, Dance
description: Take a ride into an intelligent orb, wash your mind with analog distortion. Warm your body as it melts away into the landscape itself. This is the third in a series of outdoor gallery spaces exhibiting my digital art. This is the first piece that showcases the moving image on monitor screens. Take a look at the video piece entitled "Black and White Bodies Dance, Dance, Dance"  before the void itself whisks you away!
